events.name: Russia launches fresh drone and missile strikes on Ukraine
events.wd_label: Russia launches fresh drone and missile strikes on Ukraine
events.wd_description: Russia launched new waves of drones and missile strikes on Ukraine, with explosions heard in Kyiv and five people injured in what was described as the most significant kamikaze drone attack so far.
events.description: Russia launched new waves of drones and missile strikes on Ukraine, with explosions heard in Kyiv and five people injured in what was described as the most significant kamikaze drone attack so far.

events.name: Details of the attack
events.wd_description: The attack by Russia was launched shortly after midnight and lasted for over four hours, with Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones seen across the country.
events.description: The attack by Russia was launched shortly after midnight and lasted for over four hours, with Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones seen across the country.

events.name: Kyiv's response
events.wd_description: The Mayor of Kyiv, Vitaliy Klitschko, confirmed that close to 60 drones were launched by Russia, making it the most significant attack of such kind. Emergency services responded after drone wreckages fell on a runway at Khuliany international airport.
events.description: The Mayor of Kyiv, Vitaliy Klitschko, confirmed that close to 60 drones were launched by Russia, making it the most significant attack of such kind. Emergency services responded after drone wreckages fell on a runway at Khuliany international airport.

events.name: Injuries and damages
events.wd_description: Five people were injured in Kyiv during the attack, with drone wreckages causing damage at Khuliany international airport.
events.description: Five people were injured in Kyiv during the attack, with drone wreckages causing damage at Khuliany international airport.

events.name: Announcement by Ukrainian President
events.wd_description: The President of Ukraine announced that May 9 would be celebrated as Europe Day.
events.description: The President of Ukraine announced that May 9 would be celebrated as Europe Day.

events.name: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_label: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.
events.description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.

events.name: Immediate effect of readmission
events.wd_description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.
events.description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.

events.name: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_label: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.
events.description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.

events.name: Formation of ministerial contact group
events.wd_description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.
events.description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.

events.name: Alleged Russian strike in Dnipro
events.wd_description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.
events.description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.
events.description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.
events.description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.

events.name: Ford's EV Production Expansion
events.wd_description: Ford Motor Company announced long-term contracts with multiple lithium suppliers to secure raw materials for scaling its electric vehicle production.
events.description: Ford Motor Company announced long-term contracts with multiple lithium suppliers to secure raw materials for scaling its electric vehicle production.

events.name: Lithium Supplier Agreements
events.wd_description: Ford has secured long-term lithium supply deals with multiple suppliers across three countries, with partnerships guaranteed through at least 2034.
events.description: Ford has secured long-term lithium supply deals with multiple suppliers across three countries, with partnerships guaranteed through at least 2034.

events.name: t: Albemarle Partnership
events.wd_description: Ford and Albemarle are exploring options to develop a closed-loop solution for lithium-ion battery recycling.
events.description: Ford and Albemarle are exploring options to develop a closed-loop solution for lithium-ion battery recycling.

events.name: t: Global Supplier Pool
events.wd_description: Ford has secured mineral agreements in Asia, South America, and North America to ensure a stable supply of raw materials.
events.description: Ford has secured mineral agreements in Asia, South America, and North America to ensure a stable supply of raw materials.

events.name: Supply Chain Development
events.wd_description: Ford is developing a more sustainable North American battery supply chain to fortify and de-risk its plans for sourcing key minerals.
events.description: Ford is developing a more sustainable North American battery supply chain to fortify and de-risk its plans for sourcing key minerals.

events.name: t: Indonesia Nickel Facility
events.wd_description: Ford invested in an Indonesia-based nickel facility set to open in 2026 to expand its supplier base.
events.description: Ford invested in an Indonesia-based nickel facility set to open in 2026 to expand its supplier base.

events.name: Production Site Expansions
events.wd_description: Ford is expanding its EV production sites across the U.S., including a $3.5 billion investment for its first lithium iron phosphate EV battery plant in Michigan.
events.description: Ford is expanding its EV production sites across the U.S., including a $3.5 billion investment for its first lithium iron phosphate EV battery plant in Michigan.
